body:
Hello! I'm cjrford, I have been playing this server for 5 months (I think)
and I have already noticed that so many players/staff on this server are
awesome! I am loving the server, the players, the staff, and the games!
I hope to apply for Jr. Mod some day, and I hope you will read this, if you do, I tell you this: Avicus is an amazing server! Keep playing it! 
:-D

               ~cjrford, Avicus PvPer and gamer

Welcome to the Avicus forums! If you have any questions or concerns feel free to ask any staff member, we'll be more than happy to help.

Enjoy your stay! c:
